prontera,164,167,4	script	RoK Credits Shop	116,{

mes "How can I help you?";
if(select("Yes", "No") == 1) goto L_warp;
close;
L_warp:
mes "Happy Shopping!!";
close2;
warp "turbo_room",100,100;
end;

}
